name: Arigato!
description:
Arigato! is a collection of 5-second mini-games played in rapid succession of one another, each with its own humorous theme. The games are:

  • Debt Dodge - Dodge all of your incoming loan bills at your graduation ceremony!
  • Space Bandit Shoot - Take out the bandit on the moon!
  • Fish Saver - Save this beached fish by flopping him back into the ocean!
  • Abduction - Abduct the cow, the aliens need a new ruler!
  • Ponguin - Bounce the penguin egg back and forth, but don't let it break!
  • Planetary Defense - Only one astronaut in a sports car can protect us from the meteors, don't let us down!
  • Hero Fly - This superhero with glass skin is the only one who can save the day, keep yourself afloat and dodge the oncoming buildings!
  • Toll Avoider - Aren't toll collectors the worst? Drive on past these highway demons!

Arigato! features a Custom Mode which allows the player to exclude or focus on particular mini-games. Play your friends! See if they can do better than you!

Made in Unity.
